title: Asraru'l-Athar, Volume 4

subject: Theological dictionary of Baha'i terms and concepts
description: Part of Mázindarání’s five-volume theological dictionary and encyclopedia of Bahá’í terms, concepts, and historical references. Each entry traces the usage and meaning of significant terms across the Bahá’í writings, providing essential context for understanding the sacred texts.
author_bio: Mírzá Asadu’lláh Fáḍil Mázindarání (1881–1957) was a Hand of the Cause of God and the most prolific Bahá’í historian and scholar of the 20th century. His multi-volume historical and theological works remain essential references for Bahá’í studies.
